snippet: Judith Berkson’s chamber opera, “The Vienna Rite,” about the 19th-century cantor Salomon Sulzer, had its premier at Roulette on Friday.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance of Judith Berkson chamber opera The Vienna Rite at Roulette.
lead_paragraph: Judith Berkson’s chamber opera, “The Vienna Rite,” about the 19th-century cantor Salomon Sulzer, had its premier at Roulette on Friday.

headline.seo: ‘The Vienna Rite,’ by Judith Berkson, at Roulette
headline.main: Traditions, a Friendship and a Musical Collaboration
headline.print_headline: Traditions, a Friendship and a Musical Collaboration
